name: Strange Destiny
description:
SYNOPSIS

Resurrected after your unexpected death, you wake up in a world that is unknown to you. Uncover the mystery surrounding your rebirth in this world filled with monsters where different factions are opposing themselves. 

FEATURES

-Seek monster allies and make them battle with you through Summoning. 

-On map encounters: since you can avoid them there will be no escape in battle. Be prepared. 

-A death in game won't result in a game over, you'll be given the choice to continue at a price or to return to the title screen. 

CREDITS

RPG MAKER VX ACE, Enterbrain, Inc. /Yoji Ojima

This is a demo made for the IGMC 2022: Rebirth

NOTE: The demo is now playable until the end. I hope you'll enjoy this short demo!
